alert.note: Alert for Luna (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued June 16 at 7:03PM MDT until June 16 at 7:45PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: The National Weather Service in El Paso has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Central Luna County in southwestern New Mexico... * Until 745 PM MDT. * At 702 PM MDT, an area of blowing dust was over Deming due to a thunderstorm outflow boundary. HAZARD...Less than one half mile visibility with strong winds around 30 mph. SOURCE...Detected by National Weather Service meteorologists. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 75 and 89. Locations impacted include... Deming. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
